## Counting the frequency of words
```{r}
frequency <- data.frame(t(stringdist::qgrams(freq = tips2022, q=25)))

frequency<-frequency %>% 
  arrange(desc(freq))
```

## Clustering
```{r, warning=FALSE}
corpus <- Corpus(VectorSource(tips2021))
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, removeWords, "program")
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, removeWords, "a")
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, removeWords, "get")
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, removeWords, stopwords('english'))
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, removePunctuation)
corpus <- tm_map(corpus, stemDocument)

TF <- DocumentTermMatrix(corpus, control = list(weighting = weightTf))

lda.output <- LDA(TF, k=5)
terms(lda.output)

cbind(df, terms(lda.output)[topics(lda.output)])
```
